## Bootstrap() function

Bootstrap decorator for Koatty application class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Bootstrap(bootFunc?: Function): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

bootFunc


</td><td>

Function


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional function to execute during bootstrap process


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

ClassDecorator

ClassDecorator

## Exceptions

Error if target class does not inherit from Koatty

## Example


```ts
@Bootstrap()
export class App extends Koatty {
  // ...
}
```
